title: The Krusty Krab
description: SpongeBob SquarePants has branched out into our world with its first official real life restaurant, and fans in at Berties will be able to check it out at hopefully prices not set by Mr. Krabs! Open to the public at Berties, Liverpool England. The Burguer & Restaurante is the first official standalone restaurant for the SpongeBob SquarePants franchise. In partnership with Berties, this restaurant specializes in food, areas for children’s entertainment, and retail stores all within the same space. All the while fans will be able to show off their love for SpongeBob SquarePants.

title: The Doctor Who Experience
description: The Doctor Who Experience restaurant is the perfect place to enjoy great food and show your love for Doctor Who. Our menu includes dishes inspired by the beloved series and our atmosphere is designed to feel like you’re dining in the Doctor's TARDIS. We also have events and activities to keep you entertained and engaged with Doctor Who fandom.

title: The Dine-In Cinema
description: The Dine-In Cinema combine's a cinema and restaurant. This themed restaurant allows guests to enjoy a meal while watching a film on the big screen. Enjoy hot dogs, curry and steaks while watching films from your favourite franchises like Marvel, Rocky and Star Wars.
